class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        # diff = [i-j for i, j in zip(nums, target)]
        # sign = diff[0]<0
        # ext = abs(diff[0])
        # start = 0
        # while diff[start]==0:
        #     start+=1
        # if start == len(diff)-1:
        #     return 
        # for i in range(1, len(diff)):
        #     if diff[]
        threshhold = 0
        ret = 0
        target.append(0)
        nums.append(0)
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            diff = target[i]- nums[i]
            print(diff, threshhold)
            if diff * threshhold > 0:
                if abs(diff) < abs(threshhold):
                    ret += abs(threshhold) - abs(diff)    
            else:
                ret += abs(threshhold)
            threshhold = diff
                            
        return ret
